sentence.Network_en: This stupendous novel keeps you gripped to the end.
sentence.Network_cn: 这部小说精彩到让你想一口气读完。

sentence.Network_en: He was a man of stupendous stamina and energy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个有着超强耐力、精力充沛的人。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Banff swarms year-round with visitors(终年都有大批游客蜂拥而至) who come to marvel at the stupendous(惊人的) mountain beauty that surrounds the townsite.
We had a stupendous time at the party ., 我们在社交聚会上度过了令人惊叹的时光.
stupefy v. (使)茫然，吓呆stupendous adj. 巨大的，大得惊人的stupor n.昏迷，不醒人事
spoilsport、破坏他人兴致的stupendous、巨大的，大的惊人的vault、拱顶，地窖

list.abs: the technology bred of science has catalyzed stupendous economic growth ( Nature )来源于科学的技术已经引起了巨大的经济增长(自然界)

and meanwhile , the plane , on that stupendous stage , droning over an abyss in face of a sheer white wall that seemed part of the sky itself until the sun caught it .此时，在这巨大的舞台之上，飞机伴着嗡嗡声沉闷地盘旋在一个深不可测的峡谷上方，对面是一堵陡峭的白色悬崖，若没有阳光的照射，仿佛就是天空的一部分。
We are caught in a mysterious and stupendous historical process ., 我们陷进了一个神秘的 , 巨大的历史进程里.
dream one's life away醉生梦死stupendous blunder大错特错Misfortunes never come singly祸不单行

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin stupendus 'to be wondered at' (gerundive of stupere) + -ous

entry.tran: 极大的;令人惊叹的;了不起的
entry.def: Something that is stupendous is surprisingly impressive or large.

example.ex: He was a man of stupendous stamina and energy...
example.tran: 他是个有着超强耐力、精力充沛的人。

example.ex: This stupendous novel keeps you gripped to the end.
example.tran: 这部精彩的小说会让你想一口气读完。

means.word_mean: 1. so great in size or force or extent as to elicit awe;

sentences.sentence: "colossal crumbling ruins of an ancient temple"

auth_sentence.content: The Normandy landings were a stupendous feat of organisation.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Normandy landings were a stupendous feat of organisation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Normandy landings were a stupendous feat of organisation.

auth_sentence.content: Lyn Collins, aka the Female Preacher, sounds stupendous.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lyn Collins, aka the Female Preacher, sounds stupendous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lyn Collins, aka the Female Preacher, sounds stupendous.

auth_sentence.content: I had to make...the most stupendous effort not to cry.
auth_sentence.res_content: I had to make...the most stupendous effort not to cry.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I had to make...the most stupendous effort not to cry.
